name: NSOrderedCollectionChange
desc: An object that represents an indexed change within an ordered collection.

items.name: init(object: Any?, type: NSCollectionChangeType, index: Int)
items.desc: Creates a change object that represents inserting or removing an object from an ordered collection at a specific index.

items.name: init(object: Any?, type: NSCollectionChangeType, index: Int, associatedIndex: Int)
items.desc: Creates a change object that represents inserting, removing, or moving an object from an ordered collection at a specific index.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: The index location of the change.

items.name: var object: Any?
items.desc: An object the change inserts or removes.

items.name: var associatedIndex: Int
items.desc: When this property is set to a value other than NSNotFound, the receiver is one half of a move, and this value is the index of the changeâ€™s counterpart of the opposite type in the diff.
